experiences.title: Full-Stack Developer, Back-End Lead
experiences.subtitle: Empowered Futures, Toronto
workDescription: Participating and working in the designing, planning, execution, and development phases of web-application development along with the product manager, developers and board members to achieve the end-user product.
Utilizing and gaining hands-on experience in HTML5, Bootstrap, Express, ReactJs, Node.Js, and MongoDB.
Developing 5+ features as defined and scoped by planning and product development team of 20+ developers.

Participated and contributed to 20+ weekly code reviews to ensure the code quality, maintain industry standards, and receive mentoring from the senior Full-Stack developers. Also, identifying and fixing bugs.

experiences.title: Technical Customer Support Advisor
experiences.subtitle: 24-7 Intouch Inc, Winnipeg
workDescription: Provided first-line technical support to customers experiencing difficulties with hardware, operating systems, web application, and software installation through electronic communication.

Managed 20+ support tickets daily and achieved more than 95% success rate by utilizing analytical and problem-solving skills to isolate and resolve complex technical problems through appropriate troubleshooting methodology and ensured consistently more than 98% customer satisfaction.
Trained 120+ new advisors and worked closely with Team Leaders, Managing Directors, and Quality Assurance Team to achieve the matrix target.
